text: Soulcalibur, known in Japan as (ソウルキャリバー Sourukyaribā), is a fighting video game made by Namco for the Arcades and the Dreamcast video game console. == Other websites == * Soulcalibur Series Website * Soulcalibur at the Killer List of Videogames * Soul Archive Namco-sponsored Soul series archival fansite. * * Soul Calibur Poland Polish portal and forum about Soulcalibur series. * The Soulpedia Soul series based wiki. title: Soulcalibur
